bench

Interface IContestant

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bench

    public interface IContestant
    Contestant interface of Bench instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void followCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team, int idC)
      The coaches are waken up in operation followCoachAdvice by the last of their selected contestants to stand in position.
      void seatDown(java.lang.String team)
      In Contestants life cycle, transition between "doYourBest" and "seat at the bench" SEAT_AT_THE_BENCH – blocking state the contestants are waken up in operation callContestants by their coaches if they are selected to join the next trial
      void waitForCallContestants(java.lang.String team, int idC)
      The contestants will wait here to be called to the trial in the bench.

    • Method Detail

      • followCoachAdvice

        void followCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team,
                       int idC)
        The coaches are waken up in operation followCoachAdvice by the last of their selected contestants to stand in position. In Contestants life cycle, transition between "seat at the bench" and "stand in position"
        Parameters:
        team - Team identifier, can be A or B.
        idC - The contestant ID.

      • seatDown

        void seatDown(java.lang.String team)
        In Contestants life cycle, transition between "doYourBest" and "seat at the bench" SEAT_AT_THE_BENCH – blocking state the contestants are waken up in operation callContestants by their coaches if they are selected to join the next trial
        Parameters:
        team - Team identifier, can be A or B.

      • waitForCallContestants

        void waitForCallContestants(java.lang.String team,
                            int idC)
        The contestants will wait here to be called to the trial in the bench. If the the team YXZ is select, then the contestant will verify if there is in the array of selected contestants to do the best in the rope game. When the contestant leaves the bench then is decremented one variable that conunts how many contestants there is in the bench. One more important thing, we need the ID of the last contestant that is up to then inform the coach that all the contestants are ready to go.
        Parameters:
        team - Team identifier, can be A or B.
        idC - The contestant ID.
